record.field: ACT 12 Meter LSZH Singlemode 9/125 OS2 Fiber Patch Cable Duplex LC/LC

ACT 12 Meter LSZH Singlemode 9/125 OS2 Fiber Patch Cable Duplex with LC Connectors - designed for high-speed data transmission in telecommunications and networking environments.
Key Features: - OS2 Singlemode 9/125 fiber optic cable - Duplex (2-strand) configuration - LC/LC connectors on both ends - 12 meter length - LSZH (Low Smoke Zero Halogen) jacket - Yellow cable color for easy identification - Factory terminated and tested - Low insertion loss - High bandwidth capacity - UPC (Ultra Physical Contact) polishing - Supports 1310nm and 1550nm wavelengths - Suitable for long-distance data transmission - Compliant with industry standards

LSZH (Low Smoke Zero Halogen) jacket provides: - Resistance to common industrial chemicals - Protection against acids and bases in indoor environments - Resistance to cleaning agents and solvents - Limited exposure to petroleum-based products - Reduced toxicity and corrosiveness in case of fire
Not recommended for direct exposure to harsh chemicals or outdoor environments without additional protection.

IEC 60332-1 Flame Retardant IEC 60754-1 Zero Halogen IEC 61034-2 Low Smoke RoHS Compliant REACH Compliant ITU-T G.652.D Fiber Standard ISO/IEC 11801 Category OS2 TIA/EIA 568-C.3 Compliant ANSI/TIA-568-C.3 TIA/EIA-604-10A (FOCIS 10)

Designed for indoor and data center environments with LSZH (Low Smoke Zero Halogen) jacket for enhanced safety in case of fire.
Fiber optic core is insensitive to electromagnetic interference (EMI) and radio frequency interference (RFI).
Cable bend radius: 30mm static, 60mm dynamic. Exceeding minimum bend radius may result in increased attenuation or permanent damage.
Maximum tensile load: 220N short term, 110N long term.
Temperature cycling performance tested according to IEC 60794-1-22, F1.
Not suitable for direct burial, underwater applications, or extreme outdoor exposure without proper protection.
Operating temperature range suitable for most data center and telecommunications room environments.
